name: Party Fellas
description:
Optimistically explosive beat 'em up party game for 2-4 players, where everything can happen!

Party Fellas was made by team of two. We used Houdini and a little bit of Photoshop for this game ;) This is our first project in Unreal.

Team Name

Imago Basement

Maciej Tworek made stuff work

Piotr Kądziołka made stuff look

Gameplay Instructions

Left Stick - Running

Right Stick - Shooting

A - Jumping

Thank you for your time!

xD
